nodes.text: Corbro Stanch was a male Human Mandalorian who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

A Human Mandalorian with blue armor, Corbro Stanch worked as a bounty hunter during the Great Galactic War. During the Cold War, he lived in the city of Mos Ila on the planet Tatooine, where he worked as a bounty hunter trainer.
Corbro Stanch appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a trainer for the bounty hunter class on Tatooine.
